column2: Rating parameters enable visitors to your business to give their accurate opinions about your business depending on various fields / parameters relevant to your business. Rating parameters are dependent on the category of your business. There are different rating parameters for the various categories. Apart from parameter based ratings, visitors would also be able to give an overall rating for your business.

column1: Why I am not able to write reviews for my business?
column2: business Admins are not allowed to write reviews for their own businesses. If you are a business admin, you will not be able to write a review for your own business. Other members on this community can review your business.

column1: Someone has written an inaccurate review for my business. What should I do?
column2: If someone has written an inaccurate or unfavourable review for your business, then we recommend you to first communicate with the reviewer yourself, and ask clarification for the review. You may explain to the reviewer the actual situation, and why you feel that their review is inappropriate. It is most likely that in this case, the reviewer might edit their review and rating themselves. If that does not yield results, then you may report the review to our site administrators by clicking on the “Report” link on the main review business, and filling the appropriate values. Our site administrators will then take appropriate action on the review.

column1: If I change the category of my business, will it affect business ratings?
column2: If you change the category of your business, then the overall rating of the business remains unaffected but the ratings based on various parameters will all be reset to zero. Now, the Rating parameters associated with the new category will be displayed to the visitors.

column1: I want to search for a specific business Review. How can I do that?
column2: You can search for a business Review using the detailed search box available in the “Review” section under business navigation.

column1: What are Featured business Reviews? Who can mark Reviews for businesses as Featured?
column2:
Featured business Reviews are reviews of businesses which are specially marked as “Featured”. Such reviews are more highlighted than others and thus gain more visibility. Featured business Reviews appear in the “Featured Reviews” slideshow in the “Reviews” section under business navigation. On “Browse Reviews” for business Reviews and in search results, they are marked with a “Featured” marker. The search form for business Reviews also has a quick filter for seeing Featured Reviews.
business Reviews can be made Featured only by our site administrators.
